title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Lean Transition and Team Learning—Language Education Teams Based on Psychological Safety

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can concretely explain three practical strategies for fostering psychological safety in team-based collaborative environments.
Learners can design a learning effectiveness measurement tool by applying Lean Transition principles (standardization, continuous improvement) to language education team projects.
Learners can analyze conflict situations arising during team learning and develop a feedback protocol for restoring psychological safety.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
